com.apple.audio.units
Class AudioDeviceOutputUnit

public class AudioDeviceOutputUnit
extends OutputAudioUnit

This class represents those audio units that talk directly to an output device on the System.

Method Detail

getCurrentDevice

public AudioDevice getCurrentDevice()
                             throws CAException
This will get the current output device for the system. If the user chooses a new output device then this device will no longer be the default output. Thus when getting this property the user should also register a listener for notifications for changes in this property (kDefaultAudioOutputProperty_CurrentDevice), and then get the new device at that point.

CoreAudio::AudioUnitGetProperty

Returns:
an AudioDevice
Throws:
CAException
